description:
At the Ratton Law Group PC, our legal team provides compassionate and aggressive representation to people in Detroit, Michigan, who are suffering from injuries caused by others' negligence or are facing divorce or criminal charges. We also assist professionals in defending their licenses.

Our attorneys excel at the negotiation table, but we are also skilled at handling litigation, appeals and class actions.

Medical Malpractice

The attorneys at our law office have experience working as health care professionals, which gives us an advantage in malpractice cases. From emergency room errors and surgical mistakes to birth injuries and failure to treat or diagnose, we understand the many ways that medical mistakes can impact someone's future. Our goal is to seek full and fair compensation to cover all damages that clients suffer as a result of medical negligence.

Personal Injury

When careless or abusive actions cause harm, those who are at fault should be held liable for the damages. Our law office takes cases involving:

  • Motor vehicle accidents
  • Motorcycle crashes
  • Aviation and mass transit accidents
  • Animal bites
  • Assault and battery - plaintiff
  • Brain injuries
  • Construction accidents
  • Nursing home abuse
  • Premises liability

Families of victims may be able to file a wrongful death claim when a loved one dies as a result of negligence.

Family Law

Every divorce is unique, and we seek the solution that best suits the circumstances around your situation, whether it involves a collaborative divorce, litigation, a military divorce, fathers' rights, same-sex family law, child custody and support matters or domestic violence and neglect.

Clients of Ratton Law Group PC may schedule virtual appointments if coming to our law office is not convenient. We accept credit card payments, and the initial consultation is free.
